moves.name: Beak Blast
moves.effect: The user takes up a counterattacking posture. Using this move again will cause the user to attack, then leave this posture. No other actions can be taken while in this posture. The user will attack if hit by an attack move while it is in this counterattacking posture, then the user leaves this posture. If the move was a physical attack move, leaves the opponent that used it burned.

moves.name: Second Wind!
moves.effect: Ensures that the user’s next attack will be a critical hit. Makes the user able to endure the next hit it takes that would reduce it to 0 HP.
